result.eng: The editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.
result.ga: Beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san Iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san Iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san Iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainnThe editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an t-eagarṫóir ag freastal ar ċoṁḋáil san Iodáil an tseaċtain seo ċugainnThe editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.

result.eng: We'll have a party next week.
result.ga: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainnWe'll have a party next week.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cóisir againn an tseaċtain seo ċugainnWe'll have a party next week.

result.eng: Monday is the worst day of the week.
result.ga: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseachtain
result.orig: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseachtain
result.html: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseachtainMonday is the worst day of the week.
result.ponchtml: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseaċtainMonday is the worst day of the week.

result.ga: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Lá éigin an tseachtain seo chugainnSome day next week.
result.ponchtml: Lá éigin an tseaċtain seo ċugainnSome day next week.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ga: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.orig: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.html: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé anseo an tseaċtain seo caite mar ḃí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.orig: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.html: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ponchtml: Ina ḋiaiḋ sin is breá liom dul go dtí an ṗictiúrlann i nGailliṁ uair sa tseaċtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.

result.eng: What day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ga: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.orig: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.html: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ponchtml: Cén lá den tseaċtain ab ḟearr liḃ taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.orig: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.html: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ponchtml: Dé Doṁnaiġ bím ag obair - ag déanaṁ réiḋ don tseaċtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.

result.eng: One hundred euro per person per week.
result.ga: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtain

result.html: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtainOne hundred euro per person per week.

result.eng: I go to a film once a week.
result.ga: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtain
result.orig: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtain
result.html: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtainI go to a film once a week.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig scannán uair sa tseaċtainI go to a film once a week.

result.eng: Until next week, good-bye and God bless.
result.ga: Go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.orig: Go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.html: Go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannachtUntil next week, good-bye and God bless.

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.html: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit báisteaċ ṫrom níos deireanaí an tseaċtain sin agus ṫarla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
